title: Can we reduce the size of SkiaSharp dlls? I just install skiaSharp and implemented basic resize and my build size has became doubled.
body:
Can we reduce the size of SkiaSharp dlls? I just install skiaSharp and implemented basic resize and my build size has became doubled. SkiaSharp 2.88 its 39.7MB

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4658991/218031366-82dcf59a-eef5-440b-9b54-8242db7d5570.png)

and with 1.68 its 30.1 MB
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4658991/218068582-36320637-0b95-464d-be29-a4265926ff0c.png)
